message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $800000, but considering the current market conditions and my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates its true value, I am offering it to you at a special price. My offer to you is $900000. I trust this reflects the product's worth while also providing you with a chance to own something truly exceptional. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can arrange a meeting to discuss the details further.
